job.title: Software Engineer, Web
job.description: Job Summary:<br><br>We are looking for a talented front-end engineer to join a team that creates large-scale, highly-performant web applications. This team transforms large, complex datasets into fast and responsive user interfaces used by millions of people.<br><br>As a Software Engineer for Web (Full Stack), you will help us push the boundaries of what is possible on the client. You'll work with a team of other developers alongside systems engineers, services engineers and project managers. You are highly proficient in JavaScript, HTML and CSS and appreciate the details that make a user experience exceptional. You demonstrate enthusiasm for new technologies, languages, frameworks, and platforms.<br><br>We believe we offer unique opportunities for any technologist, including:<br><br><ul><li>The ability to work on a bleeding edge technology stack.</li><li>Influencing the innovation of products used globally by millions.</li><li>An open, team-driven environment that fosters constructive feedback and collective problem-solving<br><br></li></ul>Responsibilities:<br><br><ul><li>Implement web interfaces and applications using JavaScript (ES6+), HTML and CSS.</li><li>Work on a modern stack including React, NodeJS, Amazon Web Services.</li><li>Enforce code quality through test driven development.</li><li>Distill product requirements into design and technical specifications.</li><li>Collaborate closely with other engineering, product, and marketing teams to define product requirements.<br><br></li></ul><strong>Basic Qualifications:<br><br></strong><ul><li>2-3+ years of experience building web applications.</li><li>Experience in a NodeJS application development environment.</li><li>Experience working within a modern JavaScript workflow through technologies such as: GitHub, CSS Preprocessors, Styled Components, Single Page Application frameworks and Module Bundlers (Webpack etc.)</li><li>Proven ability to integrate with service APIs and/or SDKs.</li><li>Experience with root-cause analysis and troubleshooting infrastructure issues.<br><br></li></ul>Preferred Qualifications:<br><br><ul><li>Experience with streaming video, e-commerce, large data applications and analytics suites.</li><li>Hands on experience with React/Redux in a production application.<br><br></li></ul>Required Education<br><br><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent work experience<br><br></li></ul>828150BR
